The New Foscote Hospital is a world-class private hospital in Oxfordshire, serving the Cotswolds and Warwickshire regions and beyond with highest quality hospital treatments and aftercare. It is a small hospital, committed to the provision of individualised care and attention from the whole team.  The New Foscote Hospital is located on the outskirts of the historic market town of Banbury, in a quiet residential area just off the Oxford Road and Hightown Road. It is easily accessible from Banbury and the surrounding region.Mr Alan Doherty offers  HIFU and NanoKnife treatments at this hospital.Hospital phone: 01295 252281Consultant at The New Foscote Hospital:Mr Alan DohertyConsultant UrologistAt The Focal Therapy Clinic we are passionate about prostate cancer sufferers knowing about all of their treatment options.We know that settling on the right treatment is a big decision for you. If you would like to speak to one of our friendly and knowledgeable patient advocates about your diagnosis and  Focal Therapy treatment option then please do not hesitate to get in touch today.All enquiries to The Focal Therapy Clinic are confidential, and we are delighted to offer our advice and support with no obligation.
